title: South flooding and storms - as it happened - BBC News
summary: two hurt as train derailed in landslide .
houses hit by lightning in christchurch , dorset and caversham , berkshire .
flood alerts in steventon and sutton courtenay , oxfordshire and in pangbourne , berkshire .
severe train delays across oxfordshire and newbury station in berkshire is flooded .
several roads in berkshire closed due to flooding , including a major road in reading .

documents.title: post-heatwave storm brings flash floods
text: post-heatwave storm brings flash floods

documents.title: thank you for joining us
text: with the weather having improved across the region and much of the disruption having been dealt with , we are going close down our live coverage of the storms and their aftermath .
thanks for all your photos , tweets and tip-offs throughout the day .

documents.title: south weather
text: south weather

documents.title: calm after the storm
text: oxon firefighters no longer in attendance at any flooding incidents .
no met office rain alerts in force for oxon .

documents.title: breakingea : 'possible flooding still to come '
text: the environment agency has given its flood risk forecast for the next three days , but it 's areas further east that are likely to be affected .
`` during friday afternoon and into the early evening areas of heavy thundery rain will move eastwards affecting parts of the south and east of england .

`` this could lead to surface water flooding impacts , especially in urban areas , such as flooding on the road and rail network leading to significant travel delays , and possibly the flooding of properties and parts of communities .
`` on saturday afternoon in the far south-east of england further heavy showers may develop , leading to some localised travel disruption and possibly some property flooding . ''

documents.title: platforms open at didcot parkway
text: there 's still a flurry of activity at didcot parkway but we 've informed that platforms there are now open .

documents.title: tree fall causes delays between leamington spa and banbury
text: a tree on the line between leamington spa and banbury is causing disruption , network rail has warned .
a spokesman said trains were being delayed by up to 30 minutes .
he added : `` trains will be unable to run from banbury towards leamington spa until the tree has been removed .
`` disruption is expected to continue until 16:00 . ''

documents.title: signalling restored at paddington
text: network rail says signalling has been restored at london paddington , following earlier disruptions .
staff are remaining on site to monitor the situation .

documents.title: fire service urges drivers to respect road closures
text: do not move or ignore road closures signs - they are there for your safety , so please do not ignore them # berkshire

documents.title: didcot parkway flooding : clean-up begins
text: didcot parkway flooding : clean-up begins

documents.title: oxford bus company x90 service experiencing delays
text: we are currently still experiencing delays on our x90 services from this morning 's disruption .
we are trying to operate our services as regular as possible but please expect delays this afternoon in both directions .
thank you !

documents.title: latest reports on flash flooding in berkshire
text: the bbc 's duncan kennedy provides the latest updates on the flash flooding in berkshire .

documents.title: in storms across the east and south of england
text: news online has collated the most impressive of the last 12 hours , which has seen severe disruption and flooding throughout the east and south of england .
you can view them here .

text: the a33 between the binfields and crockford roundabouts in basingstoke has reopened after water was pumped away by the council .

documents.title: manhole cover struck by lightning in newbury
text: emergency roadwork maintenance has had to take place in newbury after a manhole cover was struck by lightning yesterday evening .

documents.title: news report : flooding causes major disruption across the south and the east coast
text: steven godden reports on storms and flooding across the south of england and the east coast on friday morning .

documents.title: didcot parkway ticket office to stay closed 'for some time '
text: pumps are being used at didcot parkway in a bid to remove floodwater and get the station 's platforms open `` as soon as possible '' , a spokesman said .
but he added that because of damage the ticket office is likely to stay closed `` for some time '' .

documents.title: three didcot schools closed due to flooding
text: three didcot schools have confirmed they are closed today after the flooding this morning .
they are :

documents.title: big 'splash ' for local newspaper
text: the gazette 's office has been flooded during last night 's storm
it must have been the darkening sky

documents.title: flooding closes wallingford community hospital maternity unit
text: oxford university hospitals nhs foundation trust said it has closed the midwifery-led unit at wallingford community hospital because of flooding .
a spokeswoman said : `` we have temporarily closed this unit whilst we undertake emergency checks of our facilities there to see whether they are all safe to use .
`` we will issue a further update later today after these checks have been carried out .
no women were in the unit at the time .
`` any woman who was planning on delivering at wallingford who goes into labour today will be offered the option of a home birth or the wantage midwifery-led unit as another option . ''

documents.title: more than 40 flooding incidents in berkshire
text: there were 42 flooding incidents throughout berkshire last night , according to the fire service .
manager of the county 's fire crews paul jaques said : `` [ we ] received an enormous number of calls from 6pm last night .
there were a total of 108 calls . ''
the fire service asked the public to not drive through flood water , be careful of manholes , and to not turn on gas or electrics if they have got wet .

documents.title: the county show must go on
text: south 's nikki mitchell is at a soggy royal county of berkshire show which opens tomorrow .
the show goes on !
torrential rain has not dampened spirits at @ twitterid # newbury @ twitterid @ twitterid

documents.title: preparations for the post-flood clean-up have started
text: our street cleaning crews are on standby to go round and clear up all the affected areas as soon as the flood water has drained away .
our waste crews are working around the floods in didcot .
any bins not emptied today will be emptied tomorrow if possible - if not , monday .
no doubt some people will moan if their bins do n't get emptied !
honestly

documents.title: about 550 staff 'working remotely ' due to storm damage
text: all staff at the uk headquarters of pharmaceutical company bayer have been told to work from home today due to `` some storm damage '' to its buildings in newbury , berkshire .
a spokeswoman for the conglomerate said it had `` robust contingency plans '' in place for such an occurrence .

documents.title: thunderbolt of lightning , very very frightening , woodley
text: as the cracks and prangs of thunder and lightning interrupted berkshire 's evening , photographer matt benham took full advantage of the sleepless night and took these incredible of lightning strikes .

documents.title: gasps as lightning strikes near hospital
text: midwives on their nightshift at basingstoke hospital gasped with a mixture of fear and delight as they watched the lighting display .
thanks to caroline loxton for capturing the moment on her mobile phone .

documents.title: bus delays in oxford due to flooding
text: due to weather and traffic conditions in and around oxford , some of our local services are experiencing delays of up to 30 minutes .
however , all routes are being served at the moment .
thank you for your patience during these difficult conditions .

documents.title: train derailment update : two hurt between kings langley and watford junction
text: two people were hurt when a train derailed near watford junction after torrential rain caused a landslide .
the 06:19 bst service from milton keynes to euston left the track at about 07:00 bst , network rail said .
a man was treated for a neck injury and a woman treated for chest pains .

documents.title: sewage flowing out of overwhelmed drains
text: drains up and sewage flowing into newbury station .

documents.title: royal county of berkshire show to go ahead
text: a spokesman for the royal county of berkshire show said it is still going ahead tomorrow despite the severe weather in newbury , where the show is held .

documents.title: travel update : looking to get a train out of oxford ? think again
text: as has been the case throughout the morning , trains have been crippled by the affects of heavy rain and flash flooding last night .
here 's the most recent cancellations :

documents.title: berkshire travel update : m4 westbound j8 closed
text: the m4 westbound at j8 is currently closed and traffic is going up the slip road in order for flooding to be cleared
# m4 now closed w/b at j8 # maidenhead with divert over jcn via exit and entry slips to clear flooding under bridge .

documents.title: firefighters tackling flooding across oxfordshire
text: oxfordshire county council 's fire and rescue service has dealt with a spate of calls since 04:00 linked to the heavy rain overnight .
areas affected by flash flooding include didcot , goring , wallingford , cholsey , south stoke and east hagbourne .
firefighters attended wallingford community hospital where some parts of the buildings were affected by flooding .
they have also been working to protect some properties from waters on station road in cholsey .
group manager gary coupar said : `` we 've had to deal with a number of instances of cars becoming stranded as a result of trying to drive through floodwater .
people should avoid doing this .
if the electrics in your home are being affected by floodwater please turn off the electricity ''

documents.title: areas of bournemouth flooded
text: part of the lower gardens is cordoned off while workers clear up after storm , stream still v. high @ twitterid

documents.title: weather : downpours gradually ease
text: it looks like there may be a break in the rain .
torrential downpours have been causing disruption across much of the region .
these are set to gradually ease away to the east during the day .
sunny spells will follow in western parts .
for the full 10-day forecast , visit the bbc weather pages .

documents.title: train derailed in flood 'landslide ' near watford junction
text: a train derailed near watford junction after torrential rain caused a landslide , network rail has confirmed .
no-one was injured when the 06:19 bst service from milton keynes to euston left the track , london midland said .
a portion of the train derailed at about 07:00 and was then hit by another train .
it was a `` glancing blow '' and the other train continued on its way .

text: a basement full of water

documents.title: crews return to lightning strike house
text: firefighters have returned to a house in christchurch that was struck by lightning last night .
fire destroyed part of the roof and crews have returned to the property to ensure it is safe .

documents.title: houses flooded in didcot
text: kim in didcot says her mum 's house in bridge close , didcot , has been flooded and the whole downstairs is ruined .
she said : `` people are trapped in their houses .
no one is doing anything . ''

documents.title: christchurch fire : 'large hole in the roof '
text: lightning is believed to be the cause of a fire which severely damaged a house in christchurch in the early hours .
six crews were called to tackle the blaze in cross way .

there 's a very large hole in the roof and unfortunately water has made its way down right through the property so we 've done what we can to get valuable items out and our colleagues from the british red cross were brilliant last night in giving the occupants somewhere to go and somewhere to collect their thoughts and work out what happens next .

documents.title: no services running from didcot to london
text: great western railway has said the flooded subway at didcot parkway means no services are currently running to london .
there is no estimate for when normal service will resume at the moment .
flooding is causing disruption at newbury & didcot parkway .
newbury ( delays of up to 30 mins ) .
didcot ( cancellations towards london/oxford )
services are unable to call at newbury because of flooding at the station .
services will call additionally at newbury racecourse .
if travelling from didcot parkway towards reading/london paddington , you will need to travel via swindon .
flooding is causing disruption at newbury & didcot parkway .
newbury ( no service - use racecourse ) .
didcot ( cancellations to london/oxford ) .
services towards reading & london are now able to call at newbury .
services west of newbury will continue to use newbury racecourse .
services towards reading/london & oxford are unable to call at didcot parkway .
limited road transport is available between didcot & cholsey .
didcot parkway station has now reopened after earlier flooding of the subway .
apologies for disruption today .
does this mean eastbound services are calling at didcot ( where timetabled ) rather than going to reading and back ?
thanks : )
hello charlie , yes didcot is fully open but delays and cancellations because of signalling issues at paddington .
-andy
how about the journey back from london to didcot later this evening ?
assume trains are calling at platform 1 as usual
hi dave .
platform 1 is open .
-ollie
any idea when did will reopen ?
no estimate for normal service to resume .
didcot open for services towards swindon .
-ollie
should be clear that bristol , bath , chippenham and swindon are also badly impacted .
i could have driven and been there by now .

documents.title: severe delays across rail services in the south
text: national rail has reported severe delays and cancellations across the network in the south of england .
all major updates are available on the website , but here is a summary .

documents.title: oh what a night
text: a snapshot on twitter of where the lightning was striking overnight .
storm is still a mess # farnborough # woking # guildford # basingstoke # winchester # southampton # eastleigh .
sleep well .

documents.title: homes hit by storm power cuts
text: more than 1,000 homes are without power across hampshire and dorset this morning after thunderstorms overnight .
areas affected include in purbeck , the new forest and villages north of winchester .
scottish and southern electricity said it 's not yet clear whether it 's overhead power cables which have fallen but is highly likely linked to the overnight storms .

documents.title: pictures of flooding in maidenhead
text: there have been swathes of tweets cataloguing the flooding in maidenhead , which police and the fire service are currently attending .
part of high street in the berkshire town has been closed .
do share your with us on twitter .
@ twitterid flooding on maidenhead high street , paths and drains have been heavily damaged .
hi dan , can we use these on the bbc please ?
sure
hi plse can itv meridian use ur maidenhead flood footage - if u have any video plse email adam.clark @ itv.com
yes
hi dan , would we be ok to use these for our web story ?
will credit .
yeah sure : )
thanks dan !
hi dan , did you take these pix this morning ?
would the press association be able to use them ?
thanks , ryan
hi yes they were taken 3.30am you can use them
thanks dan .

documents.title: your bournemouth lightning
text: thanks to ed holbrook who sent in this of the lightning in bournemouth .
you can send us your photos of the region via email , or on our facebook pages .

documents.title: newbury station closed due to flooding
text: newbury station in berkshire is reportedly closed this morning due to flooding .
reader ben wood sent these in from the town yesterday evening .
flooding is causing disruption at newbury & didcot parkway .
newbury ( delays of up to 30 mins ) .
didcot ( cancellations towards london/oxford )
services are unable to call at newbury because of flooding at the station .
services will call additionally at newbury racecourse .
if travelling from didcot parkway towards reading/london paddington , you will need to travel via swindon .
flooding is causing disruption at newbury & didcot parkway .
newbury ( no service - use racecourse ) .
didcot ( cancellations to london/oxford ) .
services towards reading & london are now able to call at newbury .
services west of newbury will continue to use newbury racecourse .
services towards reading/london & oxford are unable to call at didcot parkway .
limited road transport is available between didcot & cholsey .
didcot parkway station has now reopened after earlier flooding of the subway .
apologies for disruption today .
does this mean eastbound services are calling at didcot ( where timetabled ) rather than going to reading and back ?
thanks : )
hello charlie , yes didcot is fully open but delays and cancellations because of signalling issues at paddington .
-andy
will 8.30 newbury to padd .
run from racecourse ?
ta .
hi .
yes it will .
james
hi is the newbury 7:08 stopping at racecourse and is it on time ?
thnx
hi .
it 's currently 3 mins late and would use newbury racecourse instead of newbury .
-ollie
i take it the same for didcot since the station is under a foot of water ?
currently just platform 1 in use at didcot ( towards swindon ) .
-ollie
all access roads didcot parkway severely flooded as is subway , do n't even try to get there unless essential
i assume the 9.24 from newbury is running ?
if so , can someone advise whether from there or the racecourse .
the app says newbury .

documents.title: lightning strike sets roof alight
text: a house has been struck by lightning overnight during storms inchristchurch , dorset .
firefighters were called to the house in crossway after fire broke out in the roof following the strike .
the fire service said the people living in the house were uninjured .

documents.title: delays to trains through bournemouth in dorset
text: south west trains are running all services at reduced speeds across its network in dorset , there is also reported flooding at bournemouth station .
# disruptionswt delays to services through # bournemouth due to flooding

documents.title: two lanes on m4 closed due to flash flooding
text: highways england have reported that two lanes have been closed overnight at j8 around maidenhead and high wycombe .
please take care 2 lanes closed # m4 w/b within j8 ( # maidenhead/ # highwycombe ) @ twitterid on route to tackle excess surface water .

documents.title: disruption across berkshire as police announce road closures
text: police are currently tackling reports of flooding in maidenhead , newbury and chieveley in berkshire .
thames valley police says there is `` severe disruption '' on the m4 at the a34 junction near newbury .
the fire service is also responding to the flooding .
more updates as we have them .
there is severe disruption to roads inc. m4 at a34 junction with newbury and maidenhead town centre due to flooding

documents.title: latest travel and storm updates from across the south
text: good morning .
we will be providing the latest updates on travel disruption from last night 's storms which have affected roads and public transport across the south .
if you have any updates on your journey , or if you have been affected by flash flooding , please do n't hesitate to get in touch with me on twitter .
author: Alex Regan
South Online
